section.p:
ugh bòidheach a pretty egg –
Fhuair Màiri nead anns an fhraoch. Bha trì uighean bòidheach anns an nead.
Mary found a nest in the heather. There were three pretty eggs in the nest. td. 76 [adapted]

ugh ann am bocsa an egg in a box.
Dé tha anns a’ bhocsa sin? Tha uighean anns a’ bhocsa.
What is in that box? There are eggs in the box. td. 20

ugh ann an nead an egg in a nest.
Fhuair Màiri nead anns an fhraoch. Bha trì uighean bòidheach anns an nead.
Mary found a nest in the heather. There were three pretty eggs in the nest. td. 76 [adapted]
